channel.title: ZiggysPop IIA5Pack
channel.description:
Our Goal is to showcase the wide range of talent from around the sphere.
On Iguana's Indie Artists Podcast you will hear what we believe, to be a great cross-section of Independent Artists, some that need an avenue to get their music heard for the first time, some that are on the cusp of major success and others that are enjoying national, even International exposure.
Our mission is to give Independent artists a way to promote their musical talent to a wider audience....the world.
Bands submit tracks or links to:ziggy@ziggyspop.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tomorrows Top Hits, Today on Ziggyspop Indie Artists 5 Pack.
channel.itunes:author: Donald Wratten
channel.itunes:summary:
Our Goal is to showcase the wide range of talent from around the sphere.
On Iguana's Indie Artists Podcast you will hear what we believe, to be a great cross-section of Independent Artists, some that need an avenue to get their music heard for the first time, some that are on the cusp of major success and others that are enjoying national, even International exposure.
Our mission is to give Independent artists a way to promote their musical talent to a wider audience....the world.
Bands submit tracks or links to:ziggy@ziggyspop.com

item.title: Ziggyspop/LibertyJamz 10-25-09
item.description: Intro Justice William O. Douglas, quotes about Vigilance: As nightfall does not come all at once, neither does oppression. In both instances, there is a twilight when everything remains seemingly unchanged. And it is in such twilight that we all must be most aware of change in the air - however slight - lest we become unwitting victims of the darkness. more Justice William O. Douglas quotes Artists 1&2 Promo Artists 1 @2 and set up next set The Fins With Frightened By Freedom http://www.thefins.co.uk/ Queens English with Freedom 1993 http://www.myspace.com/in4rmrecords Artists 3&4 Promo Artists 3&4 and then set up The Freedom People With New R Evolution http://www.freedompeople.us/ Michael Dimitri With Let Freedom Ring http://WWW.MICHAELDIMITRI.COM/ "Name That Show" segment. See if you can remember what shows there jingles are from. I will Give you as much as I think you should need to try to place it, somewhere between 3-10 seconds I'd guess. Your reward other then self satisfaction? well nothing but enjoy em. Set Up Last Two Artists Artists 5&6 Martha Daughtrey with Why Did Lady Liberty Die http://www.marthadaughtrey.com/ Keenen Baxter With The Tapestry Of Freedom http://www.myspace.com/keenanclassicaljazz Today's Closing Quotes "Vigillance" Thomas Jefferson, quotes about Vigilance: It is a great importance to set a resolution, not to be shaken, never to tell an untruth. There is no vice so mean, so pitiful, so contemptible and he who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and third time, till at length it becomes habitual, he tells lies without attending to it, and truths without the world's believing him. This falsehood of the tongue leads to that of the heart, and in time depraves all it's good dispositions. more Thomas Jefferson quotes Barry Goldwater, quotes about Vigilance: How did it happen? How did our national government grow from a servant with sharply limited powers into a master with virtually unlimited power? In part, we were swindled. There are occasions when we have elevated men and political parties to power that promised to restore limited government and then proceeded, after their election, to expand the activities of government. But let us be honest with ourselves. Broken promises are not the major causes of our trouble. Kept promises are. All too often we have put men in office who have suggested spending a little more on this, a little more on that, who have proposed a new welfare program, who have thought of another variety of 'security.' We have taken the bait, preferring to put off to another day the recapture of freedom and the restoration of our constitutional system. We have gone the way of many a democratic society that has lost its freedom by persuading itself that if 'the people' rule, all is well. more Barry Goldwater quotes Abraham Lincoln, quotes about Vigilance: Let it [the Constitution] be taught in schools, seminaries and in colleges; let it be written in primers, in spelling books and in almanacs; let it be preached from the pulpit, proclaimed in legislative halls, enforced in courts of justice. In short, let it become the political religion of the nation. more Abraham Lincoln quotes William J. Small, quotes about Vigilance: As Hitler showed us, a press suppressed does not make a recovery. As Lenin indicated, a press controlled does not revert to a critic’s role. As history reminds us, free speech surrendered is rarely recovered. more William J. Small quotes George Washington, quotes about Vigilance: Government is not reason, it is not eloquence, it is force; like fire, a troublesome servant and a fearful master. Never for a moment should it be left to irresponsible action. more George Washington quotes Daniel Webster, quotes about Vigilance: I apprehend no danger to our country from a foreign foe ... Our destruction, should it come at all, will be from another quarter. -- From the inattention of the people to the concerns of their government, from their carelessness and negligence, I must confess that I do apprehend some danger. I fear that they may place too implicit a confidence in their public servants, and fail properly to scrutinize their conduct; that in this way they may be made the dupes of designing men, and become the instruments of their own undoing. Make them intelligent, and they will be vigilant; give them the means of detecting the wrong, and they will apply the remedy. more Daniel Webster quotes All Of The Artists Featured On LibertyJamz/Ziggyspop Are Made Available By My Friends At The Music Alley, http://www.musicalley.com Visit The Artists Websites, Buy A Track, Album Or Drop Them An Email Of Support. Until Next Week!, Live Free, Live Long, and Prosper! CitizenL - OUT! .
item.dc:creator: Donald Wratten
item.itunes:summary:
Intro
Justice William O. Douglas, quotes about Vigilance: As nightfall does not come all at once, neither does oppression. In both instances, there is a twilight when everything remains seemingly unchanged. And it is in such twilight that we all must be most aware of change in the air - however slight - lest we become unwitting victims of the darkness. more Justice William O. Douglas quotes
Artists 1&2
Promo Artists 1 @2 and set up next set The Fins With Frightened By Freedom
http://www.thefins.co.uk/
Queens English with Freedom 1993
http://www.myspace.com/in4rmrecords
Artists 3&4 Promo Artists 3&4 and then set up The Freedom People With New R Evolution
http://www.freedompeople.us/
Michael Dimitri With Let Freedom Ring
http://WWW.MICHAELDIMITRI.COM/
"Name That Show" segment.
See if you can remember what shows there jingles are from. I will Give you as much as I think you should need to try to place it, somewhere between 3-10 seconds I'd guess. Your reward other then self satisfaction? well nothing but enjoy em.
Set Up Last Two Artists Artists 5&6
Martha Daughtrey with Why Did Lady Liberty Die
http://www.marthadaughtrey.com/
Keenen Baxter With The Tapestry Of Freedom
http://www.myspace.com/keenanclassicaljazz
Today's Closing Quotes "Vigillance"
Thomas Jefferson, quotes about Vigilance: It is a great importance to set a resolution, not to be shaken, never to tell an untruth. There is no vice so mean, so pitiful, so contemptible and he who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and third time, till at length it becomes habitual, he tells lies without attending to it, and truths without the world's believing him. This falsehood of the tongue leads to that of the heart, and in time depraves all it's good dispositions. more Thomas Jefferson quotes
Barry Goldwater, quotes about Vigilance: How did it happen? How did our national government grow from a servant with sharply limited powers into a master with virtually unlimited power? In part, we were swindled. There are occasions when we have elevated men and political parties to power that promised to restore limited government and then proceeded, after their election, to expand the activities of government. But let us be honest with ourselves. Broken promises are not the major causes of our trouble. Kept promises are. All too often we have put men in office who have suggested spending a little more on this, a little more on that, who have proposed a new welfare program, who have thought of another variety of 'security.' We have taken the bait, preferring to put off to another day the recapture of freedom and the restoration of our constitutional system. We have gone the way of many a democratic society that has lost its freedom by persuading itself that if 'the people' rule, all is well. more Barry Goldwater quotes Abraham Lincoln, quotes about Vigilance: Let it [the Constitution] be taught in schools, seminaries and in colleges; let it be written in primers, in spelling books and in almanacs; let it be preached from the pulpit, proclaimed in legislative halls, enforced in courts of justice. In short, let it become the political religion of the nation. more Abraham Lincoln quotes William J. Small, quotes about Vigilance: As Hitler showed us, a press suppressed does not make a recovery. As Lenin indicated, a press controlled does not revert to a critic’s role. As history reminds us, free speech surrendered is rarely recovered. more William J. Small quotes George Washington, quotes about Vigilance: Government is not reason, it is not eloquence, it is force; like fire, a troublesome servant and a fearful master. Never for a moment should it be left to irresponsible action. more George Washington quotes Daniel Webster, quotes about Vigilance: I apprehend no danger to our country from a foreign foe ... Our destruction, should it come at all, will be f(continued)

item.title: MAP Ziggyspop, MARKET AND PROMOTE CAMPAIGN
item.description:
MAP "Market and Promote ZiggysPop" campaign running now through May 23rd. Just Before my Birthday on the 25th.
Just 2 Minutes of your time, and any donation you can happen to afford to support and GROW a podcast you enjoy! now thats a DEAL!
With 671 Subscribers, and 10,575 downloads in 7 months, just Imagine our listenership if I could actually fund some Marketing and Advertising for ZP? All contributions collected till 5-23 will be tallied and announced on 5-25 Proceeds will all go towards getting as much advertising as we can, and I'Il make sure we get the best BANG for the BUCK.
MAP funds raised so far: $32. Thanks Contributors, VERY MUCH!

item.title: ZiggyRox Radio is ON THE AIR!
item.description:
Ziggyspop Announcemt! ZiggyRox Radio is ON THE AIR NOW! Streaming 24-7 With Indie Artists Featured on The Ziggyspop Podcast. Ziggyspop X2, Now stream Ziggyspop from the office or anywhere!
Just Point your browser to: http://www.live365.com/stations/ziggyspop
ZiggyRox Radio Has Customized Daily Programming Including;
Weekly Daily Shows Like (Monday Thru Friday)! "ZiggyRox Daily Lunch Block" @ 1-2PM, "ZiggyRox After-Work Unwind Show" @ 6PM-8PM,
Weekend Shows: Saturday: "ZiggyRox Indie Top 10 Countdown" (Think Casey). SHOW @ 1PM.
Sunday: "it's Gospel Time with Ziggy" 11:AM @ Re-Run @4:PM. "ZiggyRox Indie Top 10 Countdown(R)" (Think Casey). SHOW @ 1PM.
Other Shows will be added to the line-up and content will change daily, New Rotation Begins Every Monday.
Ziggyspop X2, Now stream Ziggyspop from the office, Point your browser to: http://www.live365.com/stations/ziggyspop
Call into the Radio Show or Podcast @ 206-339-5822, Like to do a reuest show every week, with your call in requests, indie bands, Genres or other.
And Emails to: Ziggyspop.podomatic.com

item.title: 11-23-06 Ziggyspop IIA5Pack, Episode 27
item.description: Welcome Listeners and all to Ziggyspop Special Thanksgiving Edition HAPPY THANKSGIVING ALL! I PUT TOGETHER A NICE POP ROCK 5 PACK FOR YOUR ENJOYMENT. ALSO IN THIS EPISODE ZIGGYSPOP TURNS 3 MOS OLD, I'LL EXPOSE THE NUMBERS. PONT YOU TO THE LINK SO LISTENERS CAN SEE YOUR SELVES ON THE FRAPPER MAP, AS WELL AS, LEAVE A SHOUT OUT ALL RIGHT THERE. http://www.podomatic.com/cast/show/31498 ANNOUNCEMENT ABOUT EPISODE 26B DELAYED. MENTION TRIPCHORD Trevor FOR HIS POST, and link to Ziggyspop. So General Turky Lurky and I are gonna finnish off this stuffing, then go kick some insurgent ars. You'll get it later... item.title: 10-27-06 Ziggyspop Purely Political Pack Episode 19a
item.description:
EPISODE 19A - Purely Political 5 Pack
Our First 2 Tracks came courtesy my addiction to the AFI Podcast. http://allflorida.blogspot.com/
AKIR - Politricks
In addition to AKIR's vast exposure to varied East Coast flavors, his lyrical influences include: the finesse of SLICK RICK, the mellow vibe and consistent originality of Q-TIP, the smooth delivery and GQ style of BIG DADDY KANE,the rapid fire flow and intensity of KOOL G RAP and, the lyricism of RAKIM.
AKIR- The Initiation
THE MAJESTIC TWELVE - Are You Ready
A band from Wilmington, NC, USA who try hard not to suck. Independent anti-scene scenesters who are also guilty of organizing music festivals, dressing up in funny outfits for no reason, and generally keeping themselves passionately entertained at any cost.
http://music.podshow.com/index.php VISIT THE PODSAFE MUSIC NETWORK AT MUSIC.PODSHOW.COM
Call The show Line @1-206-339-5822 Visit The Feed - http:://ziggyspop.podomatic.com Vote for Ziggyspop @ Itunes

item.title: Episode 8, 9-24-06, Iguanas Indie Artists 5 pack
item.description: Episode 8 Featuring; Maticulous - Australian Vacation Mike O - Searching For Truth He Reigns The Medley john Mayer Jason Mraz - Im Yours
item.dc:creator: Donald Wratten
item.itunes:summary: Episode 8 Featuring; Maticulous - Australian Vacation Mike O - Searching For Truth He Reigns The Medley john Mayer Jason Mraz - Im Yours
